ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl Hrec Hlrec Hpl.
apply rec_consi with (la := la) (ls := ls) (hd := hd) (tl := tl) in Hrec as Hlst; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA a : ad la, ls : prec_list hd : term tl : term_list Hrec : reconnaissance d a hd Hlst : liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) Hlrec : liste_reconnait d la tl Hpl : pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d la tl Hlr : liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) Unable to unify "pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty" with "pl_path_incl pl_path_nil la".

ctx: intros d a la ls hd tl Hrec Hlrec Hpl.
apply rec_consi with (la := la) (ls := ls) (hd := hd) (tl := tl) in Hrec as Hlst; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros d a la ls hd tl Hrec Hlrec Hpl. unfold pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def. intros Hlr. apply rec_consi with (la := la) (ls := ls) (hd := hd) (tl := tl) in Hrec as Hlst; auto. exists (pl_path_cons a (pl_path_nil)). split. - apply pl_path_incl_cons. apply pl_path_incl_nil. - apply pl_path_rec_cons; auto.
